title: [feature request]: Add an X11-enabling Dockerfile
body_html:
Mine extends the pytorch image built by the current Dockerfile.

I tag the extended image pytorchX11 and the new build file is DockerfileX11

I'll be happy to contribute, together with additional lines in the README to explain the build step.
body_text:
Mine extends the pytorch image built by the current Dockerfile.
I tag the extended image pytorchX11 and the new build file is DockerfileX11
I'll be happy to contribute, together with additional lines in the README to explain the build step.
body:
Mine extends the pytorch image built by the current Dockerfile.

I tag the extended image pytorchX11 and the new build file is DockerfileX11

I'll be happy to contribute, together with additional lines in the README to explain the build step.
